Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
Delivered by:  Rabbi Jonathan Glass, Civic Center Synagogue, 49 White Street, New York, NY  10013.

Motion to spread the invocation in full upon the record by COUNCIL MEMBER REED.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Rabbi Jonathan Glass, Civic Center Synagogue, 49 White Street, New York, N.Y. 10013.

Council Member Povman moved  that the invocation be spread in full upon the Minutes and adopted.

Items.Title: Petitions and Communications
Land Use Call-Ups

By the Chair of the Land Use Committee Council Member Eisland:
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council and Section 197-d (b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application Number 010460 ZSM, a special permit shall be subject to Council review.  This application is related to application number 010459 ZRM which is subject to Council review pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Biltmore Theater, Manhattan (20010460ZSM)

Items.Title:
By the Chair of the Land Use Committee Council Member Eisland:
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council and Section 197-d (b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application Number 010585 PPM a disposition of city- owned property shall be subject to Council review.  This application is related to application number 010459  ZRM which is subject to Council review pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, 784/786 Eighth Avenue, Manhattan (C010585PPM)

Items.Title:
By the Chair of the Land Use Committee Council Member Eisland
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council and Section 197-d(b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application no. C 010513 HDM, a disposition of city-owned property, shall be subject to Council review.  This application is related to application no. C 010511 ZMM which is subject to Council review pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, City-owned non-residential real property, Manhattan ( 010513HDM)

Items.Title:
By Council Member Golden:
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(b) of the Council and Section 20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code, the Council resolves that the action of the Department of Transportation approving an enclosed sidewalk cafe located at 10031-33 Fourth Avenue, shall be subject to review by the Council.  (Application no. 20015001 TCK)
Items.MatterName: Sidewalk Cafe, 10031-33 Fourth Ave, Brooklyn (20015001TCK)

Items.Title: Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment of  JANE GOL as a Member of the City Planning Commission.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which referred to on October 12, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 31 and Section 192(a) of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment of JANE GOL, as a Member of the City Planning Commission, for the remainder of a five-year term, that expires on June 30, 2005.

Res. No. 2116

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT OF JANE GOL AS A MEMBER OF THE CITY PLANNING COMMISSION

By Council Member Povman

RESOLVED, that pursuant to Section 31 and Section 192(a) of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment of JANE GOL, as a Member of the City Planning Commission for the remainder of a five-year term, expiring on June 30, 2005.
Items.MatterName: M 1294 - Jane Gol, City Planning Commission

VICTOR L. ROBLES, City Clerk

Items.Title: Passed The Consent Agenda

Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Jane Gol to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as a member of the City Planning Commission, pursuant to Section 31 and 192 of the New York City Charter.
Items.MinutesNote: Failed by Vote of 13-26-3; this item was not approved by the Council but was instead Re-referred to the Committee on Rules, Privileges & Elections.
Items.MatterName: Jane Gol, City Planning Commission

Items.Title:
Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment of  JANE GOL as a Member of the City Planning Commission.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which referred to on October 12, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 31 and Section 192(a) of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment of JANE GOL, as a Member of the City Planning Commission, for the remainder of a five-year term, that expires on June 30, 2005.

Res. No. 2116

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT OF JANE GOL AS A MEMBER OF THE CITY PLANNING COMMISSION

By Council Member Povman

RESOLVED, that pursuant to Section 31 and Section 192(a) of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment of JANE GOL, as a Member of the City Planning Commission for the remainder of a five-year term, expiring on June 30, 2005.
Items.MinutesNote: Failed by Vote of 13-26-3; this item was not approved by the Council; Re-referred to the Committee on Rules.
Items.MatterName: M 1294 - Jane Gol, City Planning Commission
